$interpreted: Theodore: ...The second miracle is harnessing the ability to eliminate monsters. Once, and for all.
Theodore: And thus, our castle has been equipped with a secret weapon known as "Rayzor". One shot, and these monsters, the bane of our world... gone!
Angelia: So that's how it is...
Soldier: Princess Angelia?!
Angelia: Yes...would you both be so kind as to escort me to the grand hallroom?
Soldier: Seize her! His Majesty King Theodore's divine plan must not be interfered with!
Naya: Sacre bleu, subordinates to King Theodore!?
Elegant Female Noble: A flying castle would indeed be a spectacle. But do we really have such an obligation toward the demihumans?
Poseur Female Noble: My sentiments exactly. Our valuable resources are depleted by their abuse, yet they contribute nothing back in return for our generosity...
Theodore: For two centuries our Kingdom has shouldered the responsibility of tending to all folk as caretaker.
Theodore: The Sun sees no difference in its children. We are all blessed with the warmth of its shining embrace...
Theodore: Yet thirty years ago, a tragedy struck Atlas, and our demihuman brethren lost their homeland.
Theodore: All these years, I have been contemplating a way to bring them back home. I have taken this on as a mission extremely dear to my heart.
Elegant Female Noble: Never knew His Majesty King Theodore was so thoughtful. What noble intentions!
Theodore: After many years of research, I am proud to say that my lifelong dream will finally be fulfilled today!
Theodore: Have we arrived at Atlas?
Soldier: We've arrived!
Theodore: At last......
Theodore: The monster swarm...aim Rayzor dead center.
Soldier: Locked on target!
Theodore: ...FIRE!
Ecstatic Male Noble: Bravissimo!
Curly Haired Male Noble: Long live the King! May the Sun shine forever!
Theodore: The Kingdom will worry about monster invasions no more! Not with such an unparalleled arsenal!
Theodore: And peace shall be restored to this forsaken city!
Angelia: NO! I stand against this terrible weapon!
Elegant Female Noble: Princess Angelia?
Poseur Female Noble: Wasn't she feeling unwell?
Theodore: Angelia...have you recovered?
Angelia: Our noble guests have stood testimony to what this catastrophic cannon is capable of.
Angelia: But, have you also taken note of how much havoc it has wreaked upon the soil of their homeland?
Theodore: This is a fair exchange for eliminating the monsters. How else will there be peace?
Angelia: Peace?
Angelia: If such power was turned upon other nations, will there be peace for any of us at all?
Theodore: ...I have no such desire...Angelia, what's the matter with you?
Angelia: Don't lie to me!
Angelia: That warning shot, a show of force with Rayzor was to intimidate our neighbours into humble submission, isn't that so?
Theodore: Prestigious guests, the Princess has just recovered from illness, and her mental condition remains to be determined. Please excuse this outburst.
Theodore: Guards, take the princess back to her quarters!

Angelia: Uncle. I'm sure you haven't forgotten,
that today is my twentieth birthday, or have you?
Theodore: ………….
Angelia: As a descendant of the almighty Dragon Slayer, and all nobles as my witness! With the power vested in me, I hereby claim the crown.
Angelia: And my first command upon ascension, is the immediate destruction of Rayzor!
Theodore: Princess. You are still young and naive. You don't understand, everything that I've done was for our Kingdom of the Sun, for our future!
Angelia: NO! You only think for yourself.
Theodore: Before your Rite of Passage, you are still under my supervision!
Angelia: You have no choice! My ally has seized control of the engine room. No matter what, we will still take the castle back by force. Resistance is futile!
Soldier: Your Majesty King Theodore, I bring bad news. The engine room has suffered a huge explosion!
Naya: WHAT? Angel, is Nigel...?
Angelia: No idea either...let's check it out.
Theodore: Bring some guards with you. Follow them.
Curly Haired Male Noble: What is happening...?
Poseur Female Noble: Shall we go see for ourselves?

Model.Text: ...The second miracle is harnessing the ability to eliminate monsters. Once, and for all.
And thus, our castle has been equipped with a secret weapon known as "Rayzor". One shot, and these monsters, the bane of our world... gone!
So that's how it is...
Princess Angelia?!
Yes...would you both be so kind as to escort me to the grand hallroom?
Seize her! His Majesty King Theodore's divine plan must not be interfered with!
Sacre bleu, subordinates to King Theodore!?
A flying castle would indeed be a spectacle. But do we really have such an obligation toward the demihumans?
My sentiments exactly. Our valuable resources are depleted by their abuse, yet they contribute nothing back in return for our generosity...
For two centuries our Kingdom has shouldered the responsibility of tending to all folk as caretaker.
The Sun sees no difference in its children. We are all blessed with the warmth of its shining embrace...
Yet thirty years ago, a tragedy struck Atlas, and our demihuman brethren lost their homeland.
All these years, I have been contemplating a way to bring them back home. I have taken this on as a mission extremely dear to my heart.
Never knew His Majesty King Theodore was so thoughtful. What noble intentions!
After many years of research, I am proud to say that my lifelong dream will finally be fulfilled today!
Have we arrived at Atlas?
We've arrived!
At last......
The monster swarm...aim Rayzor dead center.
Locked on target!
...FIRE!
Bravissimo!
Long live the King! May the Sun shine forever!
The Kingdom will worry about monster invasions no more! Not with such an unparalleled arsenal!
And peace shall be restored to this forsaken city!
NO! I stand against this terrible weapon!
Princess Angelia?
Wasn't she feeling unwell?
Angelia...have you recovered?
Our noble guests have stood testimony to what this catastrophic cannon is capable of.
But, have you also taken note of how much havoc it has wreaked upon the soil of their homeland?
This is a fair exchange for eliminating the monsters. How else will there be peace?
Peace?
If such power was turned upon other nations, will there be peace for any of us at all?
...I have no such desire...Angelia, what's the matter with you?
Don't lie to me!
That warning shot, a show of force with Rayzor was to intimidate our neighbours into humble submission, isn't that so?
Prestigious guests, the Princess has just recovered from illness, and her mental condition remains to be determined. Please excuse this outburst.
Guards, take the princess back to her quarters!

Uncle. I'm sure you haven't forgotten,
that today is my twentieth birthday, or have you?
As a descendant of the almighty Dragon Slayer, and all nobles as my witness! With the power vested in me, I hereby claim the crown.
And my first command upon ascension, is the immediate destruction of Rayzor!
Princess. You are still young and naive. You don't understand, everything that I've done was for our Kingdom of the Sun, for our future!
NO! You only think for yourself.
Before your Rite of Passage, you are still under my supervision!
You have no choice! My ally has seized control of the engine room. No matter what, we will still take the castle back by force. Resistance is futile!
Your Majesty King Theodore, I bring bad news. The engine room has suffered a huge explosion!
WHAT? Angel, is Nigel...?
No idea either...let's check it out.
Bring some guards with you. Follow them.
What is happening...?
Shall we go see for ourselves?
